types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# {{lb|fr|Scrabble}} a technical [[play]] where a tile with a value higher than 1 is placed on a [[square]] [[multiply]]ing its value while the value of the [[word]] is simultaneous multiplied by another square
types.html:
legendre m (plural legendres)

  1. (Scrabble) a technical play where a tile with a value higher than 1 is placed on a square multiplying its value while the value of the word is simultaneous multiplied by another square
trans: a technical play where a tile with a value higher than 1 is placed on a square multiplying its value while the value of the word is simultaneous multiplied by another square
a technical play where a tile with a value higher than 1 is placed on a square multiplying its value while the value of the word is simultaneous multiplied by another square
